product_name: CycleAware Ode To Joy Handlebar Bag - Girl's
long_description: A weather-resistant tote that works as well on a handlebar as in hand, the girls' CycleAware Ode to Joy handlebar bag lets her carry her things in style, on- and off-bike. Synthetic leather construction withstands everyday use while maintaining good looks. Internal zip pocket secures smaller items; clear window holds ID or other cards; mirror is sewn into underside of flap. Straps conveniently secure around handlebar when it's time to ride; when the ride is over, it's easy to unclasp the straps and take the bag along. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light. Includes a Joy Ride heart charm.
short_description: A weather-resistant tote that works as well on a handlebar as in hand, the girls' CycleAware Ode to Joy handlebar bag lets her carry her things in style, on- and off-bike.
